item.description:
Specific Topic: Programming Your Sub-Conscious for 2013

Let's take advantage of some NLP techniques that can really turbo charge your goals for 2013.Â  Let's set them properly and set them in your future timeline.

Be prepared for some real powerful goal setting!

We will do some demos but everyone will be able to do this.

Come Learn and Play!!

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin
